Description: Handle from a mould-made pottery lamp, with a triangular handle-ornament decorated with a large acanthus from which an oak-tree springs; below the tree is a lion with a diminutive stag in its mouth. Orange-buff, micaceous clay, covered with a red-brown slip. Plaster mould.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q1940)
